body:
Hi Chris, I placed the .json files into those two folders but I still get the error. Also, quick note : The honeybee flying command also says it has failed to download the master template? {0}

Please check your internet connection, and try again!
4. Download failed!!! You need OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf to use honeybee.
Please check your internet connection, and try again!
5. Hooohooho...Flying!!
Vviiiiiiizzz...
